<!--

Hello! Thank you for contributing to Stork Search!

Before submitting, make sure you've reviewed the contribution guidelines[0] and
targeted the `main` branch.

[0]: https://github.com/jameslittle230/stork/blob/main/docs/contributing.md

If you have any questions about whether a PR will be accepted, please reach out
via Github Discussions[1] or Discord chat[2].

[1]: https://github.com/jameslittle230/stork/discussions
[2]: https://stork-search.net/chat

Even if this PR resolves a Github issue, please don't use the magic syntax
("resolves #XX") in your PR description. I will label the issue as completed and
close it when the feature is released.

Thanks!
- James

-->
